data.name: XUserInputInterception
desc: Interface to add handlers for key and mouse events.
A handler is not a passive listener, it can even consume the event.

methods.name: addKeyHandler
desc: Add a new listener that is called on com.sun.star.awt.KeyEvent.
Every listener is given the opportunity to consume the event, i.e. prevent the not yet called listeners from being called.

methods.name: addMouseClickHandler
desc: Add a new listener that is called on com.sun.star.awt.MouseEvent.
Every listener is given the opportunity to consume the event, i.e. prevent the not yet called listeners from being called.

methods.name: removeKeyHandler
desc: Remove the specified listener from the list of listeners.

methods.name: removeMouseClickHandler
desc: Remove the specified listener from the list of listeners.
